name: Tales of Howl Town
summary:
Stop the werewolves and solve the mystery of Howl Town.

Tales of Howl Town is a single player mystery puzzler playable on Amazon.com. You play as Zara Briggs, an Amazon delivery driver. Upon your arrival the town of Howell, referred to the locals as "Howl Town", the Mayor informs you that there werewolves are hiding among the villagers. Players must use their detective skills to banish suspected werewolves. But, be careful! Guess incorrectly and the werewolves will attack an innocent villager. Find all four werewolves before they overrun Howl Town.

Tales of Howl Town is available to US players from 10/27/2022 to 10/31/2022.
